TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EntityClassGenerator extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Generates object context and entity classes (object layer code) from conceptual schema definition language (CSDL) files.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a language option.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Data.Entity.Design.LanguageOption languageOption) cil managed

Docs.param: A value that specifies the language of the generated code. The default language is C#.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified .
Gets an that contains the conceptual schema definition language (CSDL) to code namespace mappings.
Docs.value: The CSDL to code namespace mappings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Namespace mappings can be used to specify a different code namespace for generating code than what is specified in the CSDL file. The namespace mappings are consulted when a reference to a type is to be generated. If an entry is found, the value will be used to generate the qualified reference to the type; otherwise, the CSDL namespace will be used.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmSchemaError> GenerateCode(string sourceEdmSchemaFilePath, string targetFilePath) cil managed

Docs.param: The generated source code file path.
Docs.summary: Generates a source code file that contains the objects that were generated from the specified conceptual schema definition language (CSDL) file.
Docs.returns: An <xref:System.Collections.IList> of that contains any generated errors.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmSchemaError> GenerateCode(class System.Xml.XmlReader sourceEdmSchema, class System.IO.TextWriter target) cil managed

Docs.param: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> that contains the CSDL file.
The <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> to which the source code is written.
Docs.summary: Generates source code using the conceptual schema definition language (CSDL) file contained in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object and outputs the generated source code to a <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>.
Docs.returns: An <xref:System.Collections.IList> of that contains any generated errors.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.Generic.IList<System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmSchemaError> GenerateCode (string sourceEdmSchemaFilePath, string targetPath, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string> additionalEdmSchemaFilePaths);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmSchemaError> GenerateCode(string sourceEdmSchemaFilePath, string targetPath, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> additionalEdmSchemaFilePaths) cil managed

Docs.param: The generated source code file path.
A list of schema file paths that can be used to resolve any references in the source schema (the CSDL file). If the source schema does not have any dependencies, pass in an empty list.
Docs.summary: Generates source code using the specified conceptual schema definition language (CSDL) file. The list of schema file paths is used to resolve any references contained in the CSDL file.
Docs.returns: An <xref:System.Collections.IList> of objects that contains any generated errors.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.Generic.IList<System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmSchemaError> GenerateCode (System.Xml.XmlReader sourceEdmSchema, System.IO.TextWriter target, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Xml.XmlReader> additionalEdmSchemas);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmSchemaError> GenerateCode(class System.Xml.XmlReader sourceEdmSchema, class System.IO.TextWriter target, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Xml.XmlReader> additionalEdmSchemas) cil managed

Docs.param: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> that contains the CSDL file.
The <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> to which you want to output the generated source code.

The list of <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> objects that contain schemas that are referenced by the source schema (the CSDL file). If the source schema does not have any dependencies, pass in an empty <xref:System.Collections.IList> object.
Docs.summary: Generates source code based on the conceptual schema definition language (CSDL) file in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object, then outputs the generated source code to a <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>. An <xref:System.Collections.IList> of <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> objects is used to resolve any references that are contained in the CSDL file.
Docs.returns: A list of objects that contains any generated errors.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the language of the generated code.
Docs.value: One of the values. The default is .

Docs.summary: Occurs when a property has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

Docs.summary: Occurs when type information has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
